feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-06-15T08:02:06.462639Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;11 年托管 SaaS 的经验教训</stitle>; <id>;https://ghiculescu.substack.com/p/11-years-of-hosting-a-saas </id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T06:01:23.663391Z</更新>; <link href="https://ghiculescu.substack.com/p/11-years-of-hosting-a-saas" />; <author>; <name>;ghiculescu</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ghiculescu</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img 源="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1200,h_600,c_fill,f_jpg,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep,g_auto/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com% 2Fpublic%2Fimages%2Fb51ff6cc-04f6-43a5-be58-fa15ae72214c_1560x500.png" style="width: 220px; height: 92px;" />;<br />;这篇文章反映了作者 11 年运行 Web 应用程序的经验，讨论了部署、托管和基础设施管理方面的挑战和经验教训。它涵盖了作者从使用Heroku 迁移到 Digital Ocean 并最终迁移到 AWS，强调了一路上的困难和错误。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#lessons-learned-from-11-years-of-hosting-a -saas" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36336748" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>; </content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Quake 的闪电枪错误解释</stitle>; <id>; https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4gNYTqn3qRc</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T05:01:23.664003Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.youtube.com /watch?v=4gNYTqn3qRc"/>; <author>; <name>;henning</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=henning</uri>; </author>; <content type= "html">;<iframe src="//www.youtube.com/embed/4gNYTqn3qRc" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen loading="lazy">;</iframe>; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat. io/#quake-s-lightning-gun-bug-explained" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36315529" 目标="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">; ESP32-C3 无线探险：物联网综合指南 [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;https://www.espressif.com/sites/default/files/documentation/ESP32-C3%20Wireless%20Adventure.pdf</ id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T04:01:23.664488Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.espressif.com/sites/default/files/documentation/ESP32-C3%20Wireless%20Adventure. pdf"/>; <author>; <name>;sohkamyung</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=sohkamyung</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;The这篇文章是 Espressif Systems 关于 ESP32-C3 微控制器 SoC 的一本书的摘要，这是一种用于连接设备的经济高效的解决方案。本书涵盖与物联网开发相关的各种主题，包括物联网项目开发、硬件设计、无线通信和量产优化。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#esp32-c3-wireless-adventure-a-comprehensive-guide-to-iot-pdf" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36336112" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;GPT-4 的原生 JSON 输出</stitle>; <id>;https://yonom.substack.com/p/native-json -output-from-gpt-4</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T20:01:23.664960Z</更新>; <link href="https://yonom.substack.com/p/native-json- output-from-gpt-4"/>; <author>; <name>;yonom</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=yonom</uri>; </author>; <内容类型="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3。 amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2Fbcf4d45c-57cd-4dca-b2d3-2f173af25df0_1600x1024.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：141px；" />;<br />;本文讨论了在集成 LLM（大型语言模型）以生成 JSON 等结构化数据时使用函数调用。这项新功能简化了流程，并允许来自 GPT 调用的更可靠的 JSON 响应。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#native-json-output-from-gpt-4" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36330972" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;使用核心 Vim 动作快速移动</stitle>; <id>;https://www.barbarianmeetscoding.com/boost-your-coding-fu-with-vscode-and -vim/moving-blazingly-fast-with-the-core-vim-motions/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T22:01:23.665424Z</更新>; <link href="https://www .barbarianmeetscoding.com/boost-your-coding-fu-with-vscode-and-vim/moving-blazingly-fast-with-the-core-vim-motions/"/>; <author>; <name>;moores</name >; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mooreds</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.barbarianmeetscoding.com/ images/vim-motions-word.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：109px；" />;<br />;Vim 中的动作是允许快速和精确移动光标的命令。有不同类型的动作，例如单词动作和类似搜索的动作，每种动作都适合不同的目的。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#moving-fast-with-the-core-vim-motions" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36312027" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;SETI 科学家制定月球监听站计划</stitle>; <id>;https://www.supercluster.com/editorial/seti-scientists-to-devise -plan-for-lunar-listening-station/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-15T01:01:23.665876Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.supercluster.com/editorial/seti -scientists-to-devise-plan-for-lunar-listening-station/"/>; <author>; <name>;yk</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=yk< /uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;文章讨论了在月球背面建立一个专门的 SETI 天文台的可能性。研究人员正在努力为这项任务定义技术规范，这将为正式的 A 阶段研究提供信息。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#seti-scientists-to-devise-plan-for-lunar-listening-station" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36334912" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;为什么核电站建设成本如此之高？</stitle>; <id>;https://progress.institute/nuclear-power-plant-建设成本/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T22:01:23.666811Z</更新>; <link href="https://progress.institute/nuclear-power-plant-construction-costs/"/ >; <author>; <name>;镰刀</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=scythe</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src= "https://progress.institute/wp-content/uploads/image-12.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：162px；" />;<br />;随着技术的进步，核电站建设成本一直在增加。高成本主要是由于人工费用、监管增加以及需要能够在受损工厂中运行的冷却系统等因素造成的。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#why-does-nuclear-power-plant-construction-cost-so-much" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36333273" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;被困在卡车下</stitle>; <id>;https://www.propublica.org/article/underride-crashes-nhtsa-dot-iihs -safety-cars-trucks</id>; <updated>;2023-06-14T21:01:23.667261Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.propublica.org/article/underride-crashes-nhtsa- dot-iihs-safety-cars-trucks"/>; <author>; <name>;danso</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=danso</uri>; </author>; < content type="html">;<img src="https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/20230613-KillerTrucks_Crash.JPG?crop=focalpoint&fit=crop&fm=webp&fp-x=0.5&fp-y =0.5&h=534&q=75&w=800&s=4ac007fa7a1ab5b8b545a546a21b279e" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;联邦安全监管机构忽视了科学研究，未能采取行动防止涉及重型卡车的致命撞车事故。小型车辆从大型商用卡车下方滑过的撞车事故很常见，每年导致数百人死亡。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#trapped-under-trucks" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=36332086" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;Nvidia H100 和 A100 GPU——比较 GPU 云提供商的可用容量</stitle>; <id>;https://llm-utils.org/Nvidia+H100+and+A100+GPUs+-+comparing+可用+容量+at+GPU+云+供应商</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T22:01:23.667718Z</更新>; <link href="https://llm-utils.org/Nvidia+H100 +and+A100+GPUs+-+comparing+available+capacity+at+GPU+cloud+providers"/>; <author>; <name>;tikkun</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=tikkun</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Nvidia H100 和 A100 GPU - 比较 GPU 云提供商的可用容量 - LLM Utils <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ #nvidia-h100-and-a100-gpus-comparing-available-capacity-at-gpu-cloud-providers" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator .com/item?id=36333321" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;我可能是互联网上唯一的邪恶 (bit) 用户 (2015)</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.benjojo.co.uk/post/evil-bit -RFC3514-real-world-usage</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T19:01:23.668092Z</更新>; <link href="https://blog.benjojo.co.uk/post/evil- bit-RFC3514-real-world-usage"/>; <author>; <name>;luu</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=luu</uri>; </author>; < content type="html">;文章讨论了愚人节制作的笑话 RFC 的概念，并重点介绍了 RFC3514，它介绍了 IPv4 标头中的“邪恶位”。笔者探究是否真的有人设置了evil bit，发现有些网站会屏蔽设置了evil bit的数据包。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#i-may-be-the-only-evil-bit-user-on-the-internet-2015" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36330116" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;科学家在土卫二上发现磷</stitle>; <id>;https://tlpnetwork.com/news/2023/06 /scientists-discover-phosphorus-on-enceladus</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T23:01:23.668456Z</更新>; <link href="https://tlpnetwork.com/news/2023/06/ scientists-discover-phosphorus-on-enceladus"/>; <author>; <name>;pseudolus</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pseudolus</uri>; </author>; < content type="html">;<img src="https://tlpnetwork.com/images/logo-main.png" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;科学家在土星的卫星土卫二上发现了生命必需元素磷。这一发现基于美国宇航局卡西尼任务收集的数据，表明土卫二可能具有支持生命存在的潜力。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#scientists-discover-phosphorus-on-enceladus" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36333762" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;使用设备电源 LED 的视频片段从设备中恢复密钥</stitle>; <id>;https://www.nassiben.com/video-based-crypta</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T20:01:23.668810Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.nassiben.com/video-based-crypta"/>; <author>; <name>;jedisct1</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jedisct1</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static.wixstatic.com/media /a53494_34b76e649d0d4b8180617a88c0553ecb~mv2.jpeg/v1/fill/w_211,h_189,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_auto/a53494_34b76e649d0d4b818 0617a88c0553ecb~mv2.jpeg" style="宽度：220px；高度：198px；" />;<br />;本文讨论了基于视频的密码分析，这是一种新方法，允许攻击者通过分析设备电源 LED 的视频片段从设备中恢复密钥。通过利用设备功耗与电源 LED 亮度之间的相关性，攻击者可以使用商用摄像机来提高采样率并恢复密钥。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#recovering-secret-keys-from-devices-using-video-footage-of-their-power-led" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36331446" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;关于 John Wick 的缓慢生产力</stitle>; <id>;https://calnewport.com/on-the -slow-productivity-of-john-wick/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T02:01:23.669355Z</更新>; <link href="https://calnewport.com/on-the-slow -productivity-of-john-wick/"/>; <author>; <name>;lawgimenez</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lawgimenez</uri>; </author>; < content type="html">;<img src="https://calnewport.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/wick-640-px.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：113px；" />;<br />;本文讨论了 Cal Newport 于 2007 年推出的“Study Hacks”博客，该博客获得了大量读者，涵盖技术、生产力和深入生活在一个分心的世界等主题。 2022 年，Cal 还推出了一个名为 TheDeepLife.com 的新门户，提供与深度生命运动相关的更多内容。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#on-the-slow-productivity-of-john-wick" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36335104" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;AMD openSIL 开源固件概念验证</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/openSIL/openSIL</id>; <updated>;2023- 06-14T20:01:23.669730Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/openSIL/openSIL"/>; <author>; <name>;wmf</name>; <uri>;https://news ...宽度：220px；高度：110px；" />;<br />;此提交不属于此存储库上的任何分支，并且可能属于存储库外部的分支。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#amd-opensil-open-source-firmware-proof-of-concept" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36331394" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;程序员相信 CPU 缓存的神话</stitle>; <id>;https://software.rajivprab.com/2018/04/29/myths-programmers- believe-about-cpu-caches/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T22:01:23.670198Z</更新>; <link href="https://software.rajivprab.com/2018/04/29/ myths-programmers-believe-about-cpu-caches/"/>; <author>; <name>;whack</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=whack</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://softwarerajivprab.files.wordpress.com/2019/07/cache.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：259px；" />;<br />;作为一名在 Intel 和 Sun 从事高速缓存工作五年的计算机工程师，我对高速缓存一致性了解了一两件事。这是大学时最难学的概念之一——但一旦你真正理解了它，它就会让你对系统设计原则产生深刻的认识。你…… <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#myths-programmers-believe-about-cpu-caches" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36333034" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat。 io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;纽约州参议院通过竞业禁止令</stitle>; <id>;https://ogletree.com/insights/new-york-state-senate- passes-prohibitions-on-non-competes/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-14T18:01:23.670555Z</updated>; <link href="https://ogletree.com/insights/new-york- state-senate-passes-prohibitions-on-non-competes/"/>; <author>; <name>;hhs</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=hhs</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://ogletree.com/app/uploads/Insights/state-development/new-york.png" style="宽度：220px；高度： 111 像素；" />;<br />;随着纽约州参议院批准两项提议禁止所有竞业禁止协议和有限禁止某些竞业禁止协议的法案，纽约州关于竞业禁止协议的法律即将发生重大变化。这些法案正在纽约州议会审议中，如果获得通过，将被送交州长 Kathy Hochul 批准。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#new-york-state-senate-passes-prohibitions-on-non-competes" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36329483" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我是一名急诊医生。这是我已经在使用 ChatGPT 帮助治疗患者的方式</stitle>; <id>;https://inflethealth.medium.com/im-an-er-doctor-here-s-how-im-already-using-chatgpt -to-help-treat-patients-a023615c65b6</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T22:01:23.670915Z</更新>; <link href="https://inflecthealth.medium.com/im-an- er-doctor-here-s-how-im-already-using-chatgpt-to-help-treat-patients-a023615c65b6"/>; <author>; <name>;SLHamlet</name>; <uri>;https://news. ycombinator.com/user?id=SLHamlet</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://miro.medium.com/v2/resize:fit:1053/1* zVkc5iNVMQQIApQS_OKAAA.jpeg" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;人工智能，特别是 ChatGPT，有可能改变医疗保健，但它的直接影响在于较小的应用程序。例如，一名急诊医生一直在使用 ChatGPT 与患者及其家属进行有效沟通，提供清晰的解释并缓解他们的顾虑。这改善了医患关系，并使医疗专业人员能够专注于提供优质护理。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#im-an-er-doctor-heres-how-im-already-using-chatgpt-to-help-treat-patients" target="_blank">; [总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36332999" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; < entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;人类在 2021 年发现了加州大学伯克利分校的骨架</stitle>; <id>;https://www.berkeleyscanner .com/2023/06/12/uc-berkeley-crime/uc-berkeley-skeleton-found-2021-clark-kerr-human-remains/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T03:01:23.671644Z </updated>; <link href="https://www.berkeleyscanner.com/2023/06/12/uc-berkeley-crime/uc-berkeley-skeleton-found-2021-clark-kerr-human-remains/" />; <author>; <name>;yawnxyz</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=yawnxyz</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img 源="https://www.berkeleyscanner.com/content/images/size/w256h256/format/jpeg/2022/09/The-Berkeley-Scanner_Icon_Color-1.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;承包商两年前在加州大学伯克利分校的一栋废弃建筑中发现了骨骼残骸，并向加州大学的一位主管报告，但该主管没有通知警方。由于对未采取行动感到沮丧，工人们于今年 1 月向加州大学警察局报告了遗体，使此案成为公众关注的焦点。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#man-found-uc-berkeley-skeleton-in-2021" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36335581" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;第一批感染 Covid-19 的人是 WIV 的科学家：美国政府消息来源</stitle>; <id>;https://public.substack.com/p/first -people-sickened-by-covid-19</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T18:01:23.672341Z</更新>; <link href="https://public.substack.com/p/first- people-sickened-by-covid-19"/>; <author>; <name>;larsiusprime</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=larsiusprime</uri>; </author>; < content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-后媒体。 s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2Ffc95afa5-03b2-441d-be51-b252465caa8f_2514x1742.jpeg" style="宽度：220px；高度：153px；" />;<br />;这篇文章提出了新的证据，表明 SARS-CoV-2 病毒可能是从武汉病毒研究所意外泄漏的。它表明，第一批感染该病毒的人是该研究所的研究人员，其中包括领导 SARS 样冠状病毒研究的胡本。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#first-people-sickened-by-covid-19-were-scientists-at-wiv-us-government-sources" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36328352" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我在 21 小时内启动了 Linux 293k 次</stitle>; <id>;https://rwmj.wordpress。 com/2023/06/14/i-booted-linux-292612-times/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T14:01:23.672697Z</更新>; <link href="https://rwmj. wordpress.com/2023/06/14/i-booted-linux-292612-times/"/>; <author>; <name>;jandeboevrie</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id =jandeboevrie</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://s0.wp.com/i/blank.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：221px； “ />;<br />;而且只用了21个小时。 Linux 6.4 有一个在引导时挂起的错误，但可能只有千分之一的引导（如果出于某种原因使用 Intel 硬件，则更少见）。令我惊讶的是，没有人注意到这一点，但我确实注意到了，因为我们使用 libguestfs 的 nbdkit 测试是随机的…… <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#i-booted-linux-293k-times -in-21-hours" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36325986" target="_blank">;[评论] </a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;启动 HN: Credal.ai (YC W23) – 企业人工智能的数据安全</stitle>; <id>;https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36326525</id>; <updated>;2023-06-14T16:01:23.673045Z</updated >; <link href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36326525"/>; <author>; <name>;r_thambapillai</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=r_thambapillai</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Credal.ai 提供聊天 UI 和 API，为使用语言模型及其公司数据的公司实施数据安全措施。它们解决了与数据控制、可见性和访问控制相关的安全和隐私障碍。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#launch-hn-credal-ai-yc-w23-data-safety-for-enterprise-ai" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36326525" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Phoenix LiveView：异步分配模式</stitle>; <id>;http://blog.andyglassman.com/2023/06/ phoenix-liveview-async-assign-pattern.html</id>; <updated>;2023-06-14T19:01:23.673381Z</updated>; <link href="http://blog.andyglassman.com/2023/06 /phoenix-liveview-async-assign-pattern.html"/>; <author>; <name>;gnutrino</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gnutrino</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEhK49xMjyducCjCYo72GKZ66nEHpEPpeqi_CJyTHThkTU10NB0O-OzPX0SqW0qwW0r2OGs4k0PoFBWVY2eu-PTC5 wEBcPx6GRe9wg5qHLcOMKCJO8bAtPQvyHSjGGOtSBzyaYY7wcUuojaHP9dZPBNWyR8mcSyTRwpCrEEoJ-J2Zk59d7PeK4Akag/s320/trains.png" 样式="宽度： 220像素； height: 220px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了如何使用 sentry-elixir 向 Elixir 代码库中的 Sentry 报告事件。它还解释了自定义指纹的概念，以对 Sentry 中的相关问题进行分组。<a href=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/#phoenix-liveview-async-assign-pattern" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item ?id=36330541" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Gorilla：与 API 连接的大型语言模型</stitle>; <id>;https://shishirpatil.github.io/gorilla/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-14T22:01:23.673720Z </updated>; <link href="https://shishirpatil.github.io/gorilla/"/>; <author>; <name>;throwaway888abc</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=throwaway888abc</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://shishirpatil.github.io/gorilla/assets/img/gorilla_method.png" style="宽度：220px ; height: 137px;" />;<br />;Gorilla 是一种微调的大型语言模型 (LLM)，在生成准确的 API 调用和减轻幻觉问题方面优于 GPT-4。它展示了 LLM 通过 API 调用和有效使用工具的潜力适应测试时文档更改。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#gorilla-large-language-model-connected-with-apis" target="_blank">;[summary]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36333290" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;长尾去哪儿了？（2022）</stitle>; <id>;https://www.honest-broker. com/p/where-did-the-long-tail-go</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T20:01:23.674060Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.honest-broker .com/p/where-did-the-long-tail-go"/>; <作者>; <name>;nickwritesit</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=nickwritesit</ uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F %2Fbucketeer-e05bbc84-baa3-437e-9518-adb32be77984.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F251717c1-623d-4534-a8c6-e0aae4488dd6_900x512.jpeg" style="width: 220px; height: 126px;" />;<br />;文章讨论了反文化的衰落及其与长尾概念的联系。它认为本应振兴文化和支持另类声音的长尾从未实现兑现承诺。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#where-did-the-long-tail-go-2022" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36310967" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;NVIDIA 人工智能红队</stitle>; <id>;https://developer.nvidia.com/blog/nvidia-ai-red-team -介绍/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T02:01:23.674432Z</更新>; <link href="https://developer.nvidia.com/blog/nvidia-ai-red-team -an-introduction/"/>; <author>; <name>;lucan</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lucan</uri>; </author>; <content type=" html">;<img src="https://developer-blogs.nvidia.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/NVIDIA-AI-Red-Team.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;文章讨论了负责任地使用和开发 AI 的重要性，特别是在信息安全方面。它介绍了 NVIDIA AI 红队的概念，这是一个跨职能团队，从信息安全的角度评估 ML 系统以识别和减轻风险。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-nvidia-ai-red-team" target="_blank">;[summary]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36335374" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;维修电子产品：循环经济解决方案</stitle>; <id>;https://nextbillion.net/repairing-electronics -circular-economy-solution-ewaste-rural-africa/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-14T19:01:23.674785Z</updated>; <link href="https://nextbillion.net/repairing-electronics -circular-economy-solution-ewaste-rural-africa/"/>; <author>; <name>;mooreds</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mooreds</uri>; < /author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://nextbillion.net/wp-content/uploads/erlend-ekseth-0a5VbkqqFFE-unsplash-copy-150x150.jpg" style="width: 220px ; height: 220px;" />;<br />;赞比亚的 SolarAid 在农村地区创建了太阳能灯回收计划，以延长太阳能灯的使用寿命。他们聘请了当地技术人员并推出了一款移动应用程序，以促进太阳能灯的维修，赋予它们第二次生命并提供更长时间的清洁光。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#repairing-electronics-a-circular-economy-solution" target="_blank">;[summary ]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36316848" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;The Overhang Problem (2007) [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;https://math.dartmouth .edu/~pw/papers/maxover.pdf</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T21:01:23.675129Z</更新>; <link href="https://math.dartmouth.edu/~pw/ papers/maxover.pdf"/>; <author>; <name>;f5ve</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=f5ve</uri>; </author>; <content type=" html">;文章讨论了悬垂问题，即一堆相同的块可以悬在桌子边缘多远的问题。以前认为最大悬垂量级为 log n，但最近的研究表明它实际上可以达到 n1/3 量级。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-overhang-problem-2007-pdf" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36332136" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
